meta.content: Website for New Haven Community Schools

li.a: Nondiscrimination and Access to Equal Educational Opportunity
Application for Free or Reduced Meals

a.span: MI School Data Visit Our Dashboard

div.h1: Welcome to New Haven Community Schools
div.p:
Our personal best. Every day.
No exceptions. No excuses.

div.h2: Empowering students to change the world

div.span: Forgotten Harvest Partners with NHCS Beginning Thursday, April 9, Forgotten Harvest will begin distributing food at New Haven High School at 9:00 a.m. Groceries, such as fruits, vegetables and meat, will be provided to families until noon. Simply drive up to the Forgotten Harvest truck, open your trunk and groceries will be placed in your car. Distribution will continue every Thursday from 9:00-Noon at the high school until further notice. Barbara VanSweden
Preschool and GSRP Parent Information and Registration Night March 12, 2020
Flyer on the Preschool and GSRP Parent Night
Watch Ariana Grande and BooBoo Stewart and learn driving safety!
School Bus Drivers Needed! Up to $20/Hour
